[00:08.40]I gave my heart away before
[00:12.85]To someone unworthy
[00:17.89]I'll pick the pieces off the floor
[00:21.81]And pray for the healing
[00:26.56]And, now, I met you in the danger zone of love
[00:32.13]You make me feel this way, babe
[00:34.53]You make me feel it
[00:36.53]I'm gonna love like I never loved before, no, babe
[00:40.69]'Cause I'm gonna love like I never, never, never known

[00:49.85]'Cause I'm gonna love like I never, never, never known
